content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” and furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with coal inventory of 2 units and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, set to automation research; status NO_POWER with updated electrical_id=10496.
- ElectricityGroup with id=10496 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL and warning “out of fuel”; fuel inventory is empty; fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water (15°); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_system updated to [38980] and steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding roughly 100 units of water at 15° and fluid_system updated to [38980].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38980 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38981 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38982 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38987 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38986 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38991 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38990 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=38993 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Pipeline Connection Failures:
  - Pipeline connection attempts using multiple fluid_system IDs (38636, 38679, 38722, 38765, 38808, 38851, 38894, 38937) consistently result in “No working PipeGroup found” errors.
  - Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify the active PipeGroup’s fluid_system ID and status before attempting a connection.

• Outdated Fluid System Identifier Usage:
  - Using stale or invalid fluid_system identifiers prevents successful pipeline connections.
  - Tip: Always reference the current fluid_system value provided by the boiler or pipeline network status.

• Fuel Supply Oversight:
  - The boiler remains in a NO_FUEL state, impeding proper operation.
  - Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory prior to initiating pipeline connections.

• Static Pipeline Readiness Checks:
  - Rigid assumptions about pipeline readiness lead to connection attempts when PipeGroups are not operational.
  - Tip: Implement dynamic checks to confirm PipeGroup readiness before attempting connectivity.
